Item.Caption: Monument to the founders of Kyiv
U.S. dollars - silver bullion, which served as money in Kiev in XII-XIII centuries.
Magdeburg Right Column (monument Baptism of Russia)
House of Kyiv-Mohyla Collegium. Engraving XVII.
Coins of King Sigismund III, who went to Kiev in the middle of XVII century.
Coins of the Empress Catherine II, who went to Kiev at the end of XVIII century.
